Author: zatJUM#9924
Content: @Dr.Terminus You can try this oneliner:```~/komodo/src/listassetchainparams | grep -v '^#' | grep ac_name | grep -v 'COQUI ' | grep -v GLXT | grep -v VRSC | awk -F'_name=' {'print $2'} | sed -e 's/\ .*//' | sort | while read coin; do komodo-cli -ac_name=${coin} importprivkey your_privkey; done```Just change "your_privkey"

Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content: you can import during sync, just not during init or an ongoing scan

Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content: if you're at a point during sync before the addy was used, then it's actually faster to do it now (with rescan set to false) rather than wait and rescan
